title: WTB Play Button!!!
body: Attempting to play a game and when I hover my mouse over the play button it is grayed out and says "We aren't able to create a lobby right now. Please exit the client and re-open it to try again." I have done this, I have used the Hextech Repair Tool, I have Initiated Full Repair under options, I have shut down and restarted my computer, This all started happening after I purchased $20 & $10 RP from the store, got hextech chests and keys opened 10 bugged out and was forced to restart after it opened the chests and I didn't even get to see all the things purchased be opened, I feel cheated,  and unsatisfied. The purchase was made and now after all that I can't even enjoy what was gained. Please resolve this.

replies.body:
It really sucks when you're all excited to open those chests and then the client goes a little wonky and you don't even get to open them =(....

Even though you didn't get to see your chests open I do see where the content was added, so no worries there! I also want to touch on that Play Button thing since it's an entirely different issue. Most of the time that button will gray out if the client notices that you might lose your connection in the middle of the game, so it tries to save you from possibly leaving a game. Let's do a quick checkup on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is in order there, but let me know if that doesn't help!
